name: unstintingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extremely generous with time, money, praise, help, etc. : give unstintingly Many people gave unstintingly of their time and energy to reduce the difficulties experienced by the refugees. Their performances in this challenging play were unstintingly, painfully honest.
More examplesFewer examplesHe served the party unstintingly for over forty years.Condolences should be offered immediately and unstintingly, without self-consciousness about how they are worded.He campaigned unstintingly for fellow sufferers to be granted the right to medical care.
